Room.Name: Riverdell Way
Room.ShortDescription: Riverdell Way continues to the north and south intersection Netherworld Lane to the south. The Iilandi University Campus is to the east.
Room.LongDescription: The Rodaisal Community Housing Complex lies to the west of the road, providing much of the housing in Oceancrest. The Iilandi University is one of the most popular learning facilities in the city, and does not charge students for the privilage of learning at the campus.
